description: The Community Ambassadors Program engages volunteers in a variety of activities at the Social Services Agency. To participate, volunteers must be 15 years and older (enrolled in 10th grade or higher), not a current SSA client, and not a current employee of Alameda County Social Services Agency or the County of Alameda. Call to inquire about current opportunities or send an e-mail to ssavolunteer@acgov.org
